mapper.insert: insert into odh_wktm_manage (USER_NO, REC_NO, REG_YMD, WKTM_TYPE, WKTM_SUBTYPE, PROJECT_STAGE, WKTM_START_YMDHM, WKTM_END_YMDHM, WKTM_TIMES, MEMO, SUB_FLG, SEPT_FLG, LOGIN_NO, LOGIN_IP, REC_INSERT_TIME, DELETE_STATE, UPDATE_NO, UPDATE_IP, REC_UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{userNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regYmd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{wktmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wktmSubtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wktmStartYmdhm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wktmEndYmdhm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wktmTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{septFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recInsertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update odh_wktm_manage set REG_YMD = #{regYmd,jdbcType=DATE}, WKTM_TYPE = #{wktmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WKTM_SUBTYPE = #{wktmSubtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_STAGE = #{projectStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WKTM_START_YMDHM = #{wktmStartYmdhm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WKTM_END_YMDHM = #{wktmEndYmdhm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WKTM_TIMES = #{wktmTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_FLG = #{subFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, SEPT_FLG = #{septFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOGIN_NO = #{loginNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, REC_INSERT_TIME = #{recInsertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_STATE = #{deleteState,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_NO = #{updateNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_IP = #{updateIp,jdbcType=CHAR}, REC_UPDATE_TIME = #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and REC_NO = #{recNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select USER_NO, REC_NO, REG_YMD, WKTM_TYPE, WKTM_SUBTYPE, PROJECT_STAGE, WKTM_START_YMDHM, WKTM_END_YMDHM, WKTM_TIMES, MEMO, SUB_FLG, SEPT_FLG, LOGIN_NO, LOGIN_IP, REC_INSERT_TIME, DELETE_STATE, UPDATE_NO, UPDATE_IP, REC_UPDATE_TIME from odh_wktm_manage

select USER_NO, REC_NO, REG_YMD, WKTM_TYPE, WKTM_SUBTYPE, PROJECT_STAGE, WKTM_START_YMDHM, WKTM_END_YMDHM, WKTM_TIMES, MEMO, SUB_FLG, SEPT_FLG, LOGIN_NO, LOGIN_IP, REC_INSERT_TIME, DELETE_STATE, UPDATE_NO, UPDATE_IP, REC_UPDATE_TIME from odh_wktm_manage where WKTM_START_YMDHM >= #{wktmStartYmdhm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and WKTM_END_YMDHM <= date_add(#{wktmEndYmdhm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, interval 1 day)
